name: Canvastags
tagline: A modular library intent on making DOM-like tags possible on canvas
body:
Welcome to Canvas Tags! This modular library is used to make objects on a canvas like buttons and inputs. It is designed to be as DOM-like a possible making it very easy to transfer HTML to your canvas.
Useful features:
1. Main file only 1kb uncompressed(as of v1.0)
2. Easy to design and use modules
3. Github repo comes with prebuilt modules
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
